name: RncFunction
description: UTRAN Radio Network Controller (RNC) resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: vnfParametersList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter set of the VNF instance(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: peeParametersList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter list for the control and monitoring of power, energy and environment

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: rncId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Unique RNC ID for the associated RNC (3GPP 23.003)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: siptoSupported
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Indicates whether the RNC supports SIPTO function

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: tceIDMappingInfoList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of Trace Collection Entity (TCE) ID and IP Address (3GPP 32.422)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: sharNetTceMappingInfoList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of shared PLMN ID, Trace Collection Entity (TCE) ID and IP Address (3GPP 32.422)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: utranCellFDD
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Frequency Division Duplex (FDD) radio cells controlled by an RNC

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: utranCellTDDLcr
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Time Division Duplex (TDD) low chip rate (LCR) radio cell controlled by an RNC

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: utranCellTDDHcr
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Time Division Duplex (TDD) high chip rate (HCR) radio cell controlled by an RNC

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: iubLink
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Logical link to a NodeB as seen from the RNC
